Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.apache.tamaya.ConfigOperator
    Use UnaryOperator
    org.apache.tamaya.ConfigQuery
    Use Function
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.tamaya.core.propertysource.BasePropertySource
    Use BasePropertySource
    org.apache.tamaya.ConfigurationProvider
    Use static methods of Configuration
    org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertyValueBuilder
    Use PropertyValue directly.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertyValue.builder(String, String)
    Will be removed, use PropertyValue directly.
    org.apache.tamaya.spisupport.DefaultConfiguration.evaluteRawValue(String)
    Use ConfigValueEvaluator.evaluteRawValue(String, ConfigurationContext).
    org.apache.tamaya.spi.ConfigurationProviderSpi.getConfiguration()
    Use ConfigurationProviderSpi.getConfiguration(ClassLoader) instead of.
    org.apache.tamaya.spi.ConversionContext.getConfigurationContext()
    Use ConversionContext.getConfiguration() and Configuration.getContext().
    org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertyValue.getMetaEntry(String)
    Use PropertyValue.getMeta(String) instead of.
    org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertyValue.getSource()
    Use getMeta("source").
    org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertySource.isScannable()
    will be removed.
    org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertyValue.of(String, String, String)
    org.apache.tamaya.Configuration.query(ConfigQuery<T>)
    Use Configuration.adapt(Function)
    org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertyValueBuilder.setSource(String)
    Use PropertyValueBuilder.addMetaEntry(String, String)
    org.apache.tamaya.spi.PropertyValue.toBuilder()
    Use PropertyValue directly.
    org.apache.tamaya.Configuration.with(ConfigOperator)
    use Configuration.map(UnaryOperator)
